data.system_settings: iPhone 6s with iOS 11.1 & iPad Air 2 with iOS 11.2 PB 1
data.actual_result: You won't see any change for the reactions in the chat preview but opening the chat directly will show it. So just a visual bug.
data.expected_result: You should see that your reaction was added or removed.
data.short_description: Clicking on current reactions in chat preview won't show whether reaction was added/removed
data.steps_to_repro: - Send a message and add some reactions for it - Now pin this message or search for this message - Open the pinned/searched message and go to the chat preview by clicking on this message - Click on the current reactions to add or remove one
